text.div:
Narrativa gerada: CodeSystem cgm-metrics-cs

Este sistema de código define o seguinte código:

CódigoEcrãDefinição
trend Trend ArrowDirection and rate of glucose change
roc Rate of ChangeNumeric rate of glucose change per minute
tir Time in RangePercentage of time glucose is within target range (70-180 mg/dL)
tbr Time Below RangePercentage of time glucose is below target (<70 mg/dL)
tbr-l1 Time Below Range Level 1Percentage of time in Level 1 hypoglycemia (54-69 mg/dL)
tbr-l2 Time Below Range Level 2Percentage of time in Level 2 hypoglycemia (<54 mg/dL)
tar Time Above RangePercentage of time glucose is above target (>180 mg/dL)
tar-l1 Time Above Range Level 1Percentage of time in Level 1 hyperglycemia (181-250 mg/dL)
tar-l2 Time Above Range Level 2Percentage of time in Level 2 hyperglycemia (>250 mg/dL)
mean Mean GlucoseAverage glucose over reporting period
sd Standard DeviationStandard deviation of glucose values
cv Coefficient of VariationCV = SD/Mean x 100, target <36%
gmi Glucose Management IndicatorEstimated HbA1c from CGM glucose
hypo-events Hypoglycemia EventsNumber of hypoglycemia episodes
hyper-events Hyperglycemia EventsNumber of hyperglycemia episodes
active-time Sensor Active TimePercentage of time sensor was recording
range-low Target Range LowerLower bound of target glucose range
range-high Target Range UpperUpper bound of target glucose range
system CGM SystemSpecific CGM device or system
site Insertion SiteBody site where sensor is inserted
sensor-days Sensor DaysDays since sensor insertion

name: CGMMetricsCS
title: CGM Metrics CodeSystem
description: CodeSystem for continuous glucose monitoring metrics

concept.definition: Direction and rate of glucose change

Percentage of time in Level 2 hypoglycemia (<54 mg/dL)
Percentage of time glucose is above target (>180 mg/dL)
Percentage of time in Level 1 hyperglycemia (181-250 mg/dL)
Percentage of time in Level 2 hyperglycemia (>250 mg/dL)
Average glucose over reporting period
Standard deviation of glucose values
CV = SD/Mean x 100, target <36%
Estimated HbA1c from CGM glucose
Number of hypoglycemia episodes
Number of hyperglycemia episodes
Percentage of time sensor was recording
Lower bound of target glucose range
Upper bound of target glucose range
Specific CGM device or system
Body site where sensor is inserted
Days since sensor insertion
